[12] In our analysis, the AC scenario is the direct control of the PS and CS scenarios, while the EC scenario was used to compare the reported inhibitory effect of elevated [CO2] on leaf-level isoprene emission (; ) with canopy-scale dynamics . [13] There was no attempt to separate temperature and drought factors in this study. [1] The experiment was repeated twice with exchanging the scenarios between the phytotron chambers and the position of each genotype in the subchambers to avoid position effects. [2] Genotypes were pooled according to their isoprene emission capabilities: wild-type and GUS/GFP genotypes to isoprene-emitters and RA1 and RA2 to nonemitters.
